cont.entity_a: Very slow operation, but effective for making finely shaved ice.
cont.entity_b: Produces fluffy ice quickly and easily.

cont.entity_a: Not suitable for large groups; better for making 1 or 2 servings.
cont.entity_b: Not suitable for large parties; better for small family use.
Ice shaver is loud, similar to a blender. Operates quietly compared to other models.

cont.entity_a: Produces fluffy, snow-like ice with great texture.
cont.entity_b: Ice tends to melt quickly after shaving.

cont.entity_a: Durable and reliable for frequent use over years. Plastic parts may rust or wear over time.
cont.entity_b: Some units have durability issues over time. Machine may overheat if used for extended periods.

Packaging.comm: Some units may arrive with missing parts.

cont.entity_a: Limited clearance underneath; avoid using tall cones.
cont.entity_b: Design is aesthetically pleasing and compact.

cont.entity_a: Using regular ice cubes results in chunky ice and frequent jams. The machine may shave plastic into the ice.
cont.entity_b: Can use regular ice cubes; no need for special molds. May require frequent maintenance to prevent jams.

Price.comm: Affordable and offers good value for the price.

Versatility.comm: Can be used for making snow cones.

cont.entity_a: Works best with ice blocks made in provided containers. Can be used with molds or ice cubes for snow cones.
cont.entity_b: Great for making snow cones and slushies.
